name: Volleyball no Kareshi (Demo)
description:
Volleyball no Kareshi!!

Play as Hinata Shouyou as he navigates volleyball tournaments, school, and new romance. Each episode will see Hinata facing new challenges, encountering lots of new rivals and potential love interests.

Help Hinata develop relationships with his teammates and rivals, improve his skills so he can be the best he can be at volleyball, and try your best not to fail out of school, lest you face the wrath of Takeda-sensei. 

Features:

  • Choose from several Haikyuu Characters to romance
  • Manage Hinata's Stats so he can play the best volleyball ever (and hopefully not fail out of school ✨)
  • Play in Volleyball Matches, making fast paced decisions in between plays.
  • And unlock special content!
Episode 1 - Inter-High on Love for You (Demo)

Hinata's first real high school tournament is in one week! You'll have six days to help him level up his volleyball so that he's ready to take Seijoh in what sounds like the most thrilling volleyball match of Hinata's life! 

Full episode coming later this year!
